title: Katakoi Seesaw
description:
Description :
        Issei moves to the city for college and is reunited with his childhood friend, Chihiro. Although Issei had avoided him for some reason in high school, the feelings of wanting to be special to Chihiro remains, and so he starts to entice him!However, he seems to be having some problems...? A seesaw love between two childhood friends that begins with a reunion!
